Package com.tiyb.tev.controller

Class TEVConvoRestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tiyb.tev.controller.TEVConvoRestController
  • @RestController
@RequestMapping("/api")
public class TEVConvoRestController
extends Object
    REST controller for working with Conversations and Conversation Messages. All Conversation APIs are blog-specific; Conversation Message APIs aren't, since they are tied to specific Conversations already.
    Author:
    tiyb

      • getAllConversationsForBlog

        @GetMapping("/conversations/{blog}")
public List<Conversation> getAllConversationsForBlog​(@PathVariable("blog")
                                                     String blog)
        GET request for listing all conversations for a given blog
        Parameters:
        blog - Blog for which to return conversations
        Returns:
        List of all conversations in the database

      • getConversationForBlogById

        @GetMapping("/conversations/{blog}/{id}")
public Conversation getConversationForBlogById​(@PathVariable("blog")
                                               String blog,
                                               @PathVariable("id")
                                               Long conversationID)
        GET to return a single conversation by ID for a given blog
        Parameters:
        blog - Not used
        conversationID - the conversation ID
        Returns:

      • getConversationForBlogByParticipant

        @GetMapping("/conversations/{blog}/{participantName}")
public Conversation getConversationForBlogByParticipant​(@RequestParam("blog")
                                                        String blog,
                                                        @RequestParam("participantName")
                                                        String participantName)
        GET to return a single conversation, by participant name, for a given blog
        Parameters:
        participantName - Name of the participant
        Returns:
        Single Conversation

      • getConversationForBlogByParticipantIdOrName

        @GetMapping("/conversations/{blog}/id/{participantId}/{participantName}")
public Conversation getConversationForBlogByParticipantIdOrName​(@PathVariable("blog")
                                                                String blog,
                                                                @PathVariable("participantId")
                                                                String participantId,
                                                                @PathVariable("participantName")
                                                                String participantName)
        GET to return a single conversation by participant ID. Because some conversations (where all messages are from the main blog and none are from the participant) will have no conversation ID, a backup method is provided whereby conversations can be searched by Participant Name instead of ID. So if the initial search (by Participant ID) returns no results, a secondary search (by Participant name) will be attempted
        Parameters:
        blog - Blog to be searched
        participantId - ID of the participant
        participantName - Name of the participant; not used if ID is successfully used to retrieve a Conversation
        Returns:
        Single Conversation

      • getUnhiddenConversationsForBlog

        @GetMapping("/conversations/{blog}/unhidden")
public List<Conversation> getUnhiddenConversationsForBlog​(@PathVariable("blog")
                                                          String blog)
        Returns all conversations that are not set to "hidden" status for a given blog
        Parameters:
        blog - Blog for which conversations should be returned
        Returns:
        List of conversations

      • getHiddenConversationsForBlog

        @GetMapping("/conversations/{blog}/hidden")
public List<Conversation> getHiddenConversationsForBlog​(@PathVariable("blog")
                                                        String blog)
        Returns all conversations that are set to "hidden" status for a given blog. Not used by TEV, but included for the sake of completeness.
        Parameters:
        blog - Blog for which conversations should be returned
        Returns:
        List of conversations

      • createConversationForBlog

        @PostMapping("/conversations/{blog}")
public Conversation createConversationForBlog​(@PathVariable("blog")
                                              String blog,
                                              @Valid @RequestBody
                                              @Valid Conversation conversation)
        POST request to submit a conversation into the system for a given blog. Instead of validating that the blog in the conversation property and the blog passed on the URL match, the object is simply updated with the value passed.
        Parameters:
        blog - The blog for which this conversation should be submitted
        conversation - The conversation object (in JSON format) to be saved into the database
        Returns:
        The same object that was saved (including the generated ID)

      • updateConversationForBlog

        @PutMapping("/conversations/{blog}/{id}")
public Conversation updateConversationForBlog​(@PathVariable("blog")
                                              String blog,
                                              @PathVariable("id")
                                              Long conversationId,
                                              @RequestBody
                                              Conversation convoDetails)
        PUT to update a conversation for a given blog
        Parameters:
        blog - Used only for validation purposes
        conversationId - ID of the convo to be updated
        convoDetails - Details to be inserted into the DB
        Returns:
        The updated Conversation details

      • ignoreConversationForBlog

        @PutMapping("/conversations/{blog}/{participant}/ignoreConvo")
public Conversation ignoreConversationForBlog​(@PathVariable("blog")
                                              String blog,
                                              @PathVariable("participant")
                                              String participantName)
        Sets a conversation to "ignored" status for a given blog. Note that the blog is still needed, not just for the URL but because multiple blogs could have had conversations with the same participant.
        Parameters:
        blog - Blog for which the conversation should be updated.
        participantName - Name of the participant in the conversation to be ignored
        Returns:
        Updated Conversation

      • unignoreConversationForBlog

        @PutMapping("/conversations/{blog}/{participant}/unignoreConvo")
public Conversation unignoreConversationForBlog​(@PathVariable("blog")
                                                String blog,
                                                @PathVariable("participant")
                                                String participantName)
        Sets a conversation to "un-ignored" status for a given blog
        Parameters:
        blog - Blog for which the conversation should be updated
        participantName - Name of the participant in the conversation to be ignored
        Returns:
        Updated Conversation

      • unignoreAllConversationsForBlog

        @GetMapping("/conversations/{blog}/unignoreAllConversations")
public void unignoreAllConversationsForBlog​(@PathVariable("blog")
                                            String blog)
        Used to reset all conversations back to an un-hidden state for a given blog
        Parameters:
        blog - Blog for which conversations should be un-hidden

        @DeleteMapping("/conversations/{blog}/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteConversation​(@PathVariable("blog")
                                                                     String blog,
                                                                     @PathVariable("id")
                                                                     Long convoId)
        DEL to delete a single conversation by ID for a given blog
        Parameters:
        blog - Used for validation purposes
        convoId - ID of convo to be deleted
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity with the response details

                                                 @PathVariable("id")
                                                 Long msgId,
                                                 @RequestBody
                                                 ConversationMessage convoMsg)
        PUT to update a conversation message for a given blog
        Parameters:
        blog - Not used
        msgId - The ID of the message to be updated
        convoMsg - The updated data
        Returns:
        The same data that was just submitted
